=Far Manager=

Far is my favorite shell...

==Download==
I'm using Far 3.0 x86 version (my primary OS is Win 7 x64).

  #. Download Full version from [http://www.farmanager.com/download.php?l=en official site]
  #. (Optionally) update binary files with my [http://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/downloads/list Far3bis].
  #. Install plugins to your's mind. Install - means unpack plugin binaries to subfolder of Far Manager.

==Plugins==
There thousands of plugins written for many years. There many sources, where you can download them.

===Main sources===
  * [http://forum.farmanager.com/viewforum.php?f=11 Plugin announces (russian)]
  * [http://plugring.farmanager.com/index.php?l=en PlugRing (rarely updated, old plugins)]

===Developer sites===
  * [http://colorer.sourceforge.net/farplugin.html Colorer (syntax hilighting in Editor, even in truecolor)]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/wiki/FarPlugins Regeditor, Picture View, ImpEx (PE browser), Far3wrap and others]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/far-plugins/ MacroLib, Unicode CharMap, Visual Compare, and others]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/far-macro-library/wiki/Common?wl=en Macros repository]
